doctor.name: Asst. Prof. Dr. SMA Alim
doctor.workplace: Bangladesh Medical University (PG Hospital)Ex Chief Consultant & Head of Department (Anaesthesia)Central Police Hospital, Dhaka
doctor.info: Asst. Prof. Dr. SMA Alim is a renowned interventional pain medicine specialist in Dhaka with an MBBS, MD (DMC), EDPM (UK), GOPF (USA), FIPM (India), and multiple fellowships in interventional pain management and musculoskeletal ultrasound from Germany and India. He holds special training in managing acute and chronic pain, low back pain, laser PLID, acupuncture (China), and various pain syndromes. Dr. Alim specializes in treating conditions like osteoarthritis, rheumatic pain, cancer pain, frozen shoulder, ankle and elbow pain, myofascial pain syndrome, neck pain, knee arthritis, and spine-related disorders. He currently serves as an Assistant Professor of Anaesthesia at Bangladesh Medical University (PG Hospital) and is the Ex Chief Consultant & Head of Anaesthesia at Central Police Hospital, Dhaka. Dr. Alim provides consultations at Proshanti Hospital Limited, located at 6, Proshanti Goli (opposite Police Line School), Malibagh, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 2.30pm to 9pm (closed on Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Lutful Aziz
doctor.specialty: Anesthesia, Pain Management, & Critical Care Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Lutful Aziz graduated from Dhaka Medical College in January, 1985. In 1990, he went to Okayama to do PhD in Anaesthesia and Pain Medicine under the Government of Japan Scholarship and he completed his PhD degree in 1995. After returning back to Bangladesh, he completed Fellowship in Anaesthesia (FCPS) from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons in 1997. Prior to his joining Evercare Hospital as a Consultant, he was Associate Professor in Banghabandhu Sheikh and was the Academic Coordinator of the Post Graduate Studies of Department of Anaesthesia, Analgesia and Intensive Care Medicine. doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Kawsar Sardar is a renowned pain medicine specialist in Dhaka with qualifications including MBBS, MD, FIPM (USA), Fellowship in Pain Management (India), and Advanced Pain Training (Netherlands). He serves as Professor and Head of the Department of Anesthesiology at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College. Dr. Sardar is an expert in managing various chronic and acute pain conditions such as back pain, neck pain, joint pain, migraine, cancer pain, nerve pain, and post-surgical pain through interventional and non-interventional methods. He sees patients at BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, Shahbag from 3pm to 5pm (Closed: Friday).
